query-mapping.description: Several queries to collect statistics about posts.

query.name: post-publish-stats
query.comment: Get statistics about the post publication on a blog.
query.sql: SELECT YEAR(p.publish_date) AS Y, MONTH(p.publish_date) AS M, COUNT(p.id) FROM awa_post AS p INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = :blog_id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[blog-create-post] WHERE p.blog_id = :blog_id AND p.status > 0 GROUP BY Y, M ORDER BY Y, M

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM p.publish_date) AS Y, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM p.publish_date) AS M, COUNT(p.id) FROM awa_post AS p INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = :blog_id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[blog-create-post] WHERE p.blog_id = :blog_id AND p.status > 0 GROUP BY Y, M ORDER BY Y, M

SELECT CAST(STRFTIME("%Y", p.publish_date) AS INTEGER) AS Y, CAST(STRFTIME("%m", p.publish_date) AS INTEGER) AS M, COUNT(p.id) FROM awa_post AS p INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = :blog_id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[blog-create-post] WHERE p.blog_id = :blog_id AND p.status > 0 GROUP BY Y, M ORDER BY Y, M

query.name: post-access-stats
query.comment: Get statistics about the post publication on a blog.
query.sql: SELECT cnt.date, cnt.counter FROM awa_counter AS cnt INNER JOIN awa_counter_definition AS def ON def.entity_type = :entity_type AND cnt.definition_id = def.id AND def.name = :counter_name INNER JOIN awa_post AS post ON post.id = :entity_id WHERE cnt.object_id = :entity_id AND cnt.date >= :first_date AND cnt.date <= :last_date
